ORG.oclc.oai.server.catalog
Class AbstractCatalog

java.lang.Object
  ORG.oclc.oai.server.catalog.AbstractCatalog
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExtendedJDBCOAICatalog, FileSystemOAICatalog, FolderOAICatalog, GettyFileSystemOAICatalog, JDBCLimitedOAICatalog, JDBCOAICatalog, NewFileSystemOAICatalog, NewJDBCOAICatalog, SRUOAICatalog, XerSRUOAICatalog, XMLFileOAICatalog
public abstract class AbstractCatalog
extends java.lang.Object

AbstractCatalog is the generic interface between OAICat and any arbitrary database. Implement this interface to have OAICat work with your database.

Author:
Jeffrey A. Young, OCLC Online Computer Library Center

getCrosswalks

public Crosswalks getCrosswalks()
Retrieve the Crosswalks property

Returns:

listSets

public abstract java.util.Map listSets()
                                throws NoSetHierarchyException,
                                       OAIInternalServerError
Retrieve the list of supported Sets. This should probably be initialized by the constructor from the properties object that is passed to it.

Returns:
a Map object containing values as the Map keys and values for the corresponding the Map values.
Throws:
NoSetHierarchyException - No sets are defined for this repository
OAIInternalServerError - An error occurred

                                       OAIInternalServerError

Returns:
a Map object containing values as the Map keys and values for the corresponding the Map values.
Throws:
BadResumptionTokenException - The resumptionToken is bad.
OAIInternalServerError - An error occurred

factory

public static AbstractCatalog factory(java.util.Properties properties,
                                      javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
                               throws java.lang.Throwable
Factory method for creating an AbstractCatalog instance. The properties object must contain the following entries:
  • AbstractCatalog.className property which points to a class that implements the AbstractCatalog interface. Note that this class must have a constructor that accepts a properties object as a parameter.
  • Crosswalks.<supported formats> properties which satisfy the constructor for the Crosswalks class

Parameters:
properties - Properties object containing entries necessary to initialize the class to be created.
Returns:
on object instantiating the AbstractCatalog interface.
Throws:
java.lang.Throwable - some sort of problem occurred.

getDescriptions

public java.lang.String getDescriptions()
Allow the database to return some Identify <description> elements

Returns:
an XML String fragment containing description elements

getSchemaLocations

public abstract java.util.Vector getSchemaLocations(java.lang.String identifier)
                                             throws IdDoesNotExistException,
                                                    NoMetadataFormatsException,
                                                    OAIInternalServerError
Retrieve a list of schemaLocation values associated with the specified identifier.

Parameters:
identifier - the OAI identifier
Returns:
a Vector containing schemaLocation Strings
Throws:
IdDoesNotExistException - The specified identifier doesn't exist.
NoMetadataFormatsException - The identifier exists, but no metadataFormats are provided for it.
OAIInternalServerError - signals an http status code 500 problem

listIdentifiers

public abstract java.util.Map listIdentifiers(java.lang.String from,
                                              java.lang.String until,
                                              java.lang.String set,
                                              java.lang.String metadataPrefix)
                                       throws BadArgumentException,
                                              CannotDisseminateFormatException,
                                              NoItemsMatchException,
                                              NoSetHierarchyException,
                                              OAIInternalServerError
Retrieve a list of Identifiers that satisfy the criteria parameters

Parameters:
from - beginning date in the form of YYYY-MM-DD or null if earliest date is desired
until - ending date in the form of YYYY-MM-DD or null if latest date is desired
set - set name or null if no set is desired
Returns:
a Map object containing an optional "resumptionToken" key/value pair and an "headers" Map object. The "headers" Map contains OAI identifier keys with corresponding values of "true" or null depending on whether the identifier is deleted or not.
Throws:
BadArgumentException - one or more of the arguments are bad.
CannotDisseminateFormatException - the requested metadataPrefix isn't supported
NoItemsMatchException - no items fit the criteria
NoSetHierarchyException - sets aren't defined for this repository
OAIInternalServerError - signals an http status code 500 problem

listIdentifiers

public abstract java.util.Map listIdentifiers(java.lang.String resumptionToken)
                                       throws BadResumptionTokenException,
                                              OAIInternalServerError
Retrieve the next set of Identifiers associated with the resumptionToken

Parameters:
resumptionToken - implementation-dependent format taken from the previous listIdentifiers() Map result.
Returns:
a Map object containing an optional "resumptionToken" key/value pair and an "headers" Map object. The "headers" Map contains OAI identifier keys with corresponding values of "true" or null depending on whether the identifier is deleted or not.
Throws:
BadResumptionTokenException - The resumptionToken is bad.
OAIInternalServerError - signals an http status code 500 problem

public abstract java.lang.String getRecord(java.lang.String identifier,
                                           java.lang.String metadataPrefix)
                                    throws IdDoesNotExistException,
                                           CannotDisseminateFormatException,
                                           OAIInternalServerError
Retrieve the specified metadata for the specified identifier

Parameters:
identifier - the OAI identifier
Returns:
the String containing the result record.
Throws:
IdDoesNotExistException - The specified identifier doesn't exist.
CannotDisseminateFormatException - The identifier exists, but doesn't support the specified metadataPrefix.
OAIInternalServerError - signals an http status code 500 problem

listRecords

public java.util.Map listRecords(java.lang.String from,
                                 java.lang.String until,
                                 java.lang.String set,
                                 java.lang.String metadataPrefix)
                          throws BadArgumentException,
                                 CannotDisseminateFormatException,
                                 NoItemsMatchException,
                                 NoSetHierarchyException,
                                 OAIInternalServerError
Retrieve a list of records that satisfy the specified criteria

Parameters:
from - beginning date in the form of YYYY-MM-DD or null if earliest date is desired
until - ending date in the form of YYYY-MM-DD or null if latest date is desired
set - set name or null if no set is desired
Returns:
a Map object containing an optional "resumptionToken" key/value pair and a "records" Iterator object. The "records" Iterator contains a set of Records objects.
Throws:
BadArgumentException - one or more of the arguments are bad.
CannotDisseminateFormatException - the requested metadataPrefix isn't supported
NoItemsMatchException - no items fit the criteria
NoSetHierarchyException - sets aren't defined for this repository
OAIInternalServerError - signals an http status code 500 problem

listRecords

public java.util.Map listRecords(java.lang.String resumptionToken)
                          throws BadResumptionTokenException,
                                 OAIInternalServerError
Retrieve the next set of records associated with the resumptionToken

Parameters:
resumptionToken - implementation-dependent format taken from the previous listRecords() Map result.
Returns:
a Map object containing an optional "resumptionToken" key/value pair and a "records" Iterator object. The "records" Iterator contains a set of Records objects.
Throws:
BadResumptionTokenException - The resumptionToken is bad.
OAIInternalServerError - signals an http status code 500 problem
